name: Amateur Radio, Inc.
description: Amateur Radio, Inc. is a leading provider of communication equipment and services specifically designed for the amateur radio community. Founded in 1995, the company has established itself as a trusted name in the industry, known for its commitment to quality, innovation, and customer service. Amateur Radio, Inc. offers a wide range of products including transceivers, antennas, amplifiers, and accessories, catering to both novice and experienced amateur radio operators. The company is dedicated to promoting the hobby of amateur radio and enhancing communication capabilities through advanced technology and reliable solutions. With a focus on community engagement, Amateur Radio, Inc. frequently participates in events, provides educational resources, and supports local amateur radio clubs. The company's mission is to empower individuals to connect, communicate, and share knowledge through the art of amateur radio, fostering a sense of community and collaboration among enthusiasts worldwide.

seo.meta_title: Amateur Radio, Inc. | Quality Communication Equipment for Enthusiasts
seo.meta_description: Explore Amateur Radio, Inc., a premier provider of amateur radio communication equipment. Discover our innovative products and commitment to the amateur radio community.

faq.answer: Amateur Radio, Inc. is headquartered in Austin, Texas, USA.

faq.answer: Amateur Radio, Inc. was founded in 1995.
